medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began this morning with generalized abdominal pain that then localized to the umbilicus and right lower quadrant (RLQ). The patient also reported subjective warmth, chills, anorexia, and positive symptoms of nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea, with no measured fevers and no melena or hematemesis.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Exercise induced asthma; previous surgery included rhinoplasty.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with melanoma; father with diabetes mellitus (DM) and coronary artery disease (CAD).
